text: Higeno ankero ne' Gebrieli'ma eno nagrama oti'noa tvaonte'ma ege'na, nagra tusi koro nehu'na navugosaregati mopafi kepri hu'na masogeno, Gebrieli'a huno, mopafi vahetfa mani'nane. Hianagi monane mopanema vagareku'ma hania knafima fore'ma hania knaza ava'nafima kana zantamimofo agafa'a antahi ama' hugahane.
